name: The Crypt (Fippler, SoothingGnome, Shadoz)
description:
The Crypt is a little horror game we made for a class project. The project took around 3 to 4 weeks.

It may have some bugs and is just an idea/prototype sort of game.

Programmer: Joshua : Shadoz

3d artists: Hazel : Fippler 

and Jayden : SoothingGnome
